welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Saucon, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Welcome, and have a wonderful time in Upper Saucon!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal offers exclusive services and amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport is used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various services and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
